name: binturong
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of civet (= small cat-like animal) that has a long tail and black fur and lives in trees in south and southeast Asia: The forest is home to protected mammals including the binturong.
More examplesFewer examplesDon't expect to see the exceptionally shy binturong.The wildlife park has a collection of red pandas and binturongs, or cat-bears.The binturong, largest of the civet family, can grow to 3 ft (91 cm) in length.
